content: आचमनं {@--1@} Rinsing the mouth, sipping water before religious ceremonies, before and after meals &c. from the palm of the hand; दद्यादाचमनं ततः <ls>Y. 1. 242</ls>, <ls n="Y. 1.">195</ls> (part of the water sipped being usually allowed to drop down). {@--2@} The water used for rinsing the mouth. {@--3@} Gargling the throat.
